repair_input.title: Repair device
repair_input.subtitle: Repair a device if it is not working as expected
repair_input.instructions: Device repair can be used to update the password used for "Device Protection" and to reinitialize the device capabilities based on what your smart meter supports. If your whatwatt Go has "Device Protection" enabled, enter the password below. If disabled, leave the field empty. The password will be tested during the repair process.

pair_password.subtitle: Your whatwatt Go device requires authentication to connect
pair_password.instructions: Your whatwatt Go device has "Device Protection" enabled and needs a password before it can be connected to Homey. Please enter the password you set in the device's web interface.
